sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="title"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      clearable
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea
      v-model="body"
      solo
      name="input-7-4"
      outlined
    ></v-textarea>
    <v-btn @click="postNote;getNotes;" color="blue"> Save </v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "NoteAdd",

  data: function () {
    return {
      title: null,
      body: null,
    };
  },

  methods: {
    postNote: function () {
      axios.post("http://localhost:3000/notes", {
        title: this.title,
        body: this.body,
      })
    },
    getNotes: function () {
      axios
        .get("http://localhost:3000/notes")
        .then((response) => (this.notes = response.data));
    },
  },
};
</script>
